commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: We'll be running the School Idol Festival! We hope to see you there!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: There will be a school idol live show during the club introductions! Please do come and watch!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I see you're hard at work! We came by to help out!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Oh, hey!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: There are so many people!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Hm? Where's Ayumu? Is she getting ready?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yep. She said she wanted to focus.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Sounds like she's really knuckling down!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: I hope the live show's a success.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: It'll be fine. This is Ayumu we're talking about here!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I'm sure she'll show everyone a good time!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: She has to hype up the School Idol Festival for us. I can't wait to watch her perform.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Let's end the chit-chat here and help them distribute some flyers!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: That's what we're here for! We're gonna distribute flyers like nobody's business!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: You're lifesavers. There are too many people around for us to hand out enough flyers on our own.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Let's divide it all up, then. How about we hand out flyers here, in the courtyard, and around the auditorium?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Please give me a pile of them and I will take them over there.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Thanks. Here you go.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Mwahaha. I, the fallen angel Yohane, shall gather and enchant the little demons before distributing every last flyer in an instant!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Okay Yoshiko, then there'll be a punishment waiting for you if you're not the first to finish handing the flyers out, zura!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I'm not agreeing to any punishment! And I'm not Yoshiko! I'm Yohane!

commands.speaker: Middle Schooler A
commands.line: Hey, isn't that μ's?!

commands.speaker: Middle Schooler B
commands.line: And Aqours, too! Huh? What are they doing here?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: *Chuckle* It looks like the middle schoolers around have started to notice.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: That's the star power of μ's and Aqours right there.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Do they get mobbed or anything when they're walking down the street?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: *Chuckle* Of course not. I'm guessing a lot of students are here because they heard that school idols are performing today.

commands.speaker: Middle Schooler C
commands.line: U-Um! You're all members of the school idol club, right?!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Hm? Yup, that's right.

commands.speaker: Middle Schooler C
commands.line: I'm a fan of yours! Can I please shake your hand, Emma? And yours too, Kanata! Everyone!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Huh? You're a fan of ours?!

commands.speaker: Middle Schooler C
commands.line: Yes! I've watched your live shows online... I applied to Nijigasaki because all of you are here!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Thank you very much. Please do look forward to our live show during the club introductions.

commands.speaker: Middle Schooler C
commands.line: O-Okay!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: You've got your own fans here to see you, too.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: They're watching you and following your efforts closely.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Yes. All of your hard work is steadily leading to results.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I got a little emotional.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Me too... Rina-chan Board says, "Moved..."

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: We should be able to pull off the School Idol Festival without a hitch if things keep going like this, right?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Everything's been going pretty smoothly!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Yeah. I think we've all pretty much done everything that needs to be done up to now.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: We've also got quite a lot of messages from school idols around the country who want to join in.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Our problem is that we still don't have a venue for the event. There's a lot we can't get done until that's been decided.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: We're gonna need a pretty big venue to pull off an event of the scale we're hoping for.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: All of the event halls and convention centers were completely booked up.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: And it's not like we can just go and rent out Tokyo Dome.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: What about that place where they hold fireworks shows? They get huge crowds every year, don't they?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, you mean in Odaiba? That place does seem pretty good since it's spacious, but after seeing the fireworks show, I know it must be tough organizing traffic control.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Hmm, isn't there anywhere else?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hanayo's got the right idea. There are lots of spacious areas around Odaiba, so we might find somewhere perfect if we look.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Ah, here you are.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Is something wrong, Shioriko?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Could I ask for your assistance? We don't have enough help right now.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Of course, I don't mind at all. What do you need me to do?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: The club tour line is getting out of control. I would like you to help manage it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Got it. I'll be there right away.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Leave the flyer distribution to us!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: We'll be there for Ayumu's live show!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Okay! I'll see you all later!
